sentences.en: A reversion is a future estate created by operation of law to take effect.
sentences.cn: 复归权是法律设立的一项可期待的地产权.

sentences.en: a reversion to traditional farming methods
Cataplasia: Degenerative reversion of cells or tissue to a less differentiated form.
sentences.cn: 退化: 细胞或组织向一种细微变异形式的退化.

sentences.en: Floral reversion was observed in the induction of style - stigma - like structure from petals, ovaries and styles.
sentences.cn: 在诱导花柱、子房、花瓣的柱头 状 物的过程中, 观察到成花逆转现象.

sentences.en: I'm trying to prevent the reversion of my garden to nature.
sentences.cn: 我正在试图防止我的花园返回一片荒芜的自然状态.

sentences.en: It's a complete reversion to primitive superstition. They are confusing cause and effect.
sentences.cn: 象未开化的人那样迷信鬼神,这完全是倒退, 他们把因果关系弄颠倒了.

sentences.en: Oil Price Drop: A Flash In The Pan Or Current Reversion?
sentences.cn: 油价下跌: 昙花一现还是趋势反转?

sentences.en: Perspective reversion can be considered as the theoretical foundation of photo rectification.
sentences.cn: 二百多年前,兰伯特在该书中提出的“透视反转”,可视为像片纠正的理论根据.

sentences.en: Reversion to sinus rhythm , by means of electrical countershock , is indicated.
sentences.cn: 可用电除颤使恢复窦性 节律 .

sentences.en: The distance or angle from action position to reversion position.
sentences.cn: 从动作位置到回复位置的距离或角度.

sentences.en: The reversion frequency is increased by the addition of mutagents.
sentences.cn: 逆转的频率靠加入诱发变因素而增加.

sentences.en: The reversion of supply - demand relation of electric power market urges the proposing of customer - oriented differential pricing.
sentences.cn: 电力市场供求关系的逆转,促使顾客导向的差别定价的提出.

sentences.en: There was the prospect of too good a fortune in reversion when Charles married Dina.
sentences.cn: 当查尔斯娶黛娜时,他就期望着有一笔可观的财产可以继承.

sentences.en: This looks like a reversion to Mexico's previous solidarity with the global left.
sentences.cn: 看起来墨西哥与全球左翼之前的连结又恢复了。

sentences.en: This rare event is probably a case of reversion to the longlost, abriginal instinct of nidification.
sentences.cn: 这稀有的事实, 也许是它们久已失去的造巢育雏的本能之重现.

可逆的；可撤消的；可反转的

应归还的；可恢复原状的
逆转；[摄] 反转；[法] 撤销
背面；相反；倒退；失败；vt. 颠倒；倒转；adj. 反面的；颠倒的；反身的；vi. 倒退；逆叫
[数] 可逆性；可撤销；可反转性
颠倒（reverse的过去式和过去分词）；翻转
回复；重提；返祖遗传；归还
逆转；回复；归还；[遗]隔代遗传；[法]继承权

trans.tran_cn: 恢复，复原，继承权，未来所有权
trans.tran_en: a return to a former condition or habit
